From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-10 09:58
Subject: Marketplace for Resolve is now Live, The Voice of the Business is back, Transform Tuesdays, Laura Mercier x Crème, Join the Greenhouse Fireside Chat
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Marketplace for RESOLVE is Now Live!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1220&user=10620> 	

We're launching a dedicated RESOLVE section on the Chalhoub Group Marketplace—where pre-loved visual merchandising items and décor can now find a second home.

This marketplace gives a new life to unused non-merchandise items (NMIs) across the business, from VM displays to furniture and more.
✔️ First-come, first-served
✔️ Delivered directly to you - no refund or exchanges
✔️ Contribute to sustainable impact
✔️ Ability for peer to peer exchange of items
The RESOLVE collection is now just a click <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1220&user=10620>  away.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png>

This marketplace gives a new life to unused non-merchandise items (NMIs) across the business, from VM displays to furniture and more.
✔️ First-come, first-served
✔️ Delivered directly to you - no refund or exchanges
✔️ Contribute to sustainable impact
✔️ Ability for peer to peer exchange of items
The RESOLVE collection is now just a click <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1220&user=10620>  away.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) initiative is back

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1221&user=10620> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) is designed with the aim to LISTEN to your voice, your feedback on our Group’s Support Services and ACT upon it. 

But why is it that important to share YOUR feedback? 

Because your participation ensures the results are accurate and truly reflective of our Group’s experience - making the insights more relevant and actionable for every one of our support services. 

You will receive an email in your inbox with a personal link to the survey which will only take you 5 to 10 minutes to complete. We rely on each one of you who will receive the Voice of the Business Survey to support this process and help deliver best-in-class operations to our team members and partners across the Group. Please make sure you are familiar with the Group’s services prior to taking this survey here.  

Stay tuned for our upcoming webinars! If you have any inquiries, please reach out to voiceofthebusiness@chalhoub.com

Transform Tuesdays

HR and Payroll are shifting from admin-heavy tasks to strategic enablers — focused on growth, compliance, and a better day-to-day for everyone.
What does a better people experience look like to you?
Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1222&user=10620> .

chunks.text:
The Beauty Division is delighted to announce an exciting collaboration between Laura Mercier and Crème the cult-favorite cookie brand, taking place at their popular Dar Al Wasl location.
Under the playful slogan “Baked to perfection, from cookies to complexion,”

Join us from June 13th – June 15th at Crème for a quick summer makeover, product displays, and goodies for the first customers!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-3-min.png> 	

Join The Greenhouse's Fireside Chat

The journey to finding product-market fit and what it really takes! 
Join us at The Greenhouse for a behind-the-scenes look at how founders test ideas, navigate early challenges, and uncover what makes a product truly resonate in the market. Whether you're building something new or exploring how great ideas gain traction, this session is for you!
Seats are limited, sign up here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1223&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1223&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1224&user=10620>

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
